name: Astral Link
description:
Game by berylliosis and Evan Andrus for GMTK 2021 (theme "Joined Together").

(I'm gonna update this later with better details and credits, but for now, here's basic controls:)

Left/Right to move

Up/Down to climb when against vine wall (up on top side, down on bottom)

Space to jump (only the ghost can jump)

Shift to swap top and bottom

If you're next to a crate, it will come with you

Get to the end to win! (It'll kick you back to the title screen.)

I'm going to sleep.
